'''Felix''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in [[Chapter I]], Act III: [[A New Star Approaches]] and the [[Monoceros Caeli Chapter]], Act I: [[Mighty Cyclops' Adventure!]]

He is a Fatui diplomat, one of several sent to [[Liyue]].
